summary: Focused on improving system reliability, deployment workflows and operational visibility.
Strong hands-on experience with CI/CD, containerized environments and production operations.

highlights: Modernization and standardization of CI/CD workflows through the design of controlled, parameterized pipelines, increasing deployment reliability and enabling self-service models across teams.
Container orchestration improvements and platform stability across production environments.
Implementation of centralized secrets management practices across distributed systems.

Reorganization and reinforcement of observability through rapid visibility solutions, metric normalization via an internal service layer, and integration of threshold-based alerting into centralized monitoring systems, promoting technical adoption across teams.
DevOps point of contact for multiple backend and frontend teams, supporting the full deployment and operational lifecycle of microservices in production cloud environments.
Evolution of the Infrastructure-as-Code and automation platform, strengthening pipelines and supporting the transition from Jenkins to GitLab CI.
Operation and maintenance of Docker Swarm-based infrastructure on Azure, ensuring platform stability in distributed environments.
Incident management across critical platform components, including API gateway (KongHQ), messaging systems, and managed data services such as MongoDB Atlas and BigQuery.
Improvement of observability and monitoring practices (ELK, Datadog) during high-demand operational periods.
Backend development for a multi-country digital payment wallet, integrating financial services across regulated environments.
Design and implementation of backend components for asynchronous payment transaction processing using messaging queues, handling persistence, transactional state management, and retry mechanisms.
Implementation of integrations with external systems and collaboration on financial traceability and auditability.
Collaboration with infrastructure teams on deployment, configuration, and service reliability.
Development and maintenance of the Banco Itaú mobile banking application.
Development of Angular/Ionic components and services to support multi-step operational flows and client-side validations.
Resolution of cross-platform styling and compatibility issues using SASS.
Integration of banking APIs and analytics tools, including participation in mobile build and store release processes (Android/iOS).

education.details: Career in system security, vulnerability mitigation and infrastructure protection.

certifications.title: HELM – Package Manager for Kubernetes Complete Master Course

descriptions.home: DevOps / SRE. Production systems, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Observability. curl-first CV.
